sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: We thank the members of the scientific organizing committee for their dedication and contributions to the meeting: Dr. Jean-Pierre Amorij, Dr. Narendra Arora, Dr. Norman Baylor, Professor David Durrheim, Professor Gagandeep Kang, Dr. Odile Leroy, Dr. Kathleen Neuzil, Dr. Bernhards Ragama Ogutu, Dr. Alexander Precioso, Professor Helen Rees, Dr. Lucky Slamet, and Dr. Gerd Zettlmeissl. Additionally, we thank the session chairs, panelists, and discussants for their valuable presentations and comments; and the meeting participants for their thorough and insightful discussions. In addition, we thank Marc Perut and Jacqueline Lee Endt of WHO, Marlo Hartung of BMGF, and Dr. Andrew Ford, Dr. Shahida Baqar, Dr. Annie Mo, Dr. Nancy Touchette, Christina McCormick, Dr. Patricia Strickler-Dinglasan, Claire Schuster, and Dr. Carolyn Deal of NIAID, for their energy and dedication in organizing this meeting.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This forum was supported in part by a NIAID cooperative agreement [grant number U01AI108543] and a grant from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation [grant number OPP1128274].

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: This report is the summary of the collective views from the meeting participants and does not necessarily reflect the views of BMGF, NIH/NIAID, and WHO. It should not be construed as an official BMGF, NIH/NIAID, or WHO position, policy, or decision unless so designated by other documentation. No official endorsement should be made.
